mapper.select: SELECT b.BNO, b.PATH, COUNT(l.bno) AS cnt FROM INTR_BOARD b LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_LKMB l ON b.BNO = l.BNO GROUP BY BNO order by bno desc limit #{startRowNo}, #{pageSize}

SELECT b.BNO, mem.NKNM,mem.MPPHO, b.PATH, b.BOCTT, COUNT(DISTINCT l.lno) AS cnt, b.BRTDT FROM INTR_BOARD b LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_MEMBER mem ON b.MEMNO = mem.MEMNO LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_LKMB l ON b.BNO = l.BNO LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_BTMACH hm ON b.BNO = hm.BNO WHERE b.BNO = #{value}
SELECT m.NKNM, b.CRTDT FROM INTR_BCMMT b LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_MEMBER m ON b.MEMNO = m.MEMNO WHERE b.BNO = #{value} ORDER BY b.CNO DESC
SELECT bo.BNO, ht.TNAME FROM INTR_BOARD bo INNER JOIN INTR_BTMACH mt ON bo.BNO = mt.BNO LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_HASHTAG ht ON mt.HTNO = ht.HTNO WHERE bo.BNO = #{value}
SELECT m.MEMNO, l.BNO FROM INTR_MEMBER m INNER JOIN INTR_LKMB l ON m.MEMNO = l.MEMNO WHERE m.MEMNO = #{value}
SELECT * FROM `INTR_LKMB` WHERE BNO = #{no} AND MEMNO = #{memNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM `INTR_LKMB` WHERE BNO = #{no} AND MEMNO = #{memNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BNO FROM `INTR_BOARD` WHERE BNO = #{no} AND MEMNO = #{memNo}
SELECT * FROM `INTR_BRLK` ORDER BY LNO DESC LIMIT 1
select bno from INTR_BOARD order by bno desc limit 1

SELECT b.BNO, COUNT(DISTINCT l.LNO) cnt, COUNT(DISTINCT c.CNO) cmtCnt, b.PATH FROM INTR_BOARD b LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_LKMB l ON b.BNO = l.BNO LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_BCMMT c ON b.BNO = c.BNO WHERE b.memno = #{bno} GROUP BY b.BNO ORDER BY b.BNO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INTR_BOARD WHERE MEMNO = #{no}
